title: The Ultimate Guide to Keto for Developers
excerpt: Learn how to stay sharp while coding all night with a proper keto meal plan.
content:
Keto isn't just about weight — it's about energy and focus. In this guide I break down a weekly plan, what to eat before long coding sessions, and how to keep electrolytes in check.

Weekly sample

  • Breakfast: 3 eggs, avocado, 20g flaxseed
  • Lunch: Grilled mackerel, broccoli, olive oil
  • Dinner: Turkey mince stir-fry with spinach

More tips: stay hydrated, track potassium (aim ~4-5g/day), and time carbs around your workouts.

title: How I Deploy a Laravel API (Docker + DigitalOcean)
excerpt: A simple, repeatable workflow to build, test, and deploy APIs using CI and Docker.
content:
Deploying should be boring — predictable steps, backups, and health checks. I use GitHub Actions to build images and push to a registry, then pull the image on a droplet and run via Docker Compose.

Checklist

  1. Automated tests pass
  2. Build and push image
  3. Migrate database with downtime window

title: Micro-Habits for 3x Productivity as a Dev
excerpt: Small changes that compound: 45-minute sprints, inbox rules, and attention time blocks.
content: Productivity is boring — it's about protecting your attention. The key is predictable routines: time-box, batch, and say no to unnecessary meetings.
